Our Services

Complete Dental Care Under One Roof

From routine checkups to advanced cosmetic procedures, we provide comprehensive dental services at both our Winnipeg locations.

General Dentistry

Comprehensive care for your everyday dental needs

  • Emergency Dental Care
    Walk-ins and emergency appointments available. We're here when you need us most.
  • Cleanings & Exams
    Regular checkups and professional cleanings to maintain optimal oral health.
  • Fillings
    Common cavity treatment to restore tooth structure and prevent further decay.
View All Services

Cosmetic Dentistry

Transform your smile with our aesthetic treatments

  • InvisalignÂ®
    Straighten teeth discreetly without traditional metal braces.
  • Zoom! Whitening
    Professional teeth whitening for a brighter, more confident smile.
  • Lumineers/Veneers
    Natural-looking smile restoration with minimal tooth preparation.
View All Services

Specialty Services

Advanced care with cutting-edge technology

  • CEREC Technology
    Digital impressioning for one-appointment restorations.
  • IV Sedation
    Deep relaxation during procedures for anxious patients.
  • Children's Dentistry
    Gentle, friendly care designed specifically for young patients.
View All Services
